title: Placing Dead In Grave Dua
description: Authentic supplications for Placing Dead In Grave Dua
seoContent: Authentic invocations and supplications for Placing Dead In Grave Dua. Derived from reliable sources including Hisnul Muslim.

items.title: Dua 163
items.translation: In the name of Allah and upon the sunnah of the Messenger of Allah.

description_ar: من الأذكار والأدعية الصحيحة: دعاء وضع الميت في القبر
